import React from "react" import {Card, CardContent, Typography, Grid} from "@material-ui/core" import CountUp from "react-countup" import cx from "classnames" import styles from "./Cards.module.css" function Cards({data : {confirmed, recovered, deaths, lastUpdate}}){ console.log(confirmed); if(!confirmed){ return "Loading..." } return(
Infected {new Date(lastUpdate).toDateString()} Number of active covid19 cases Recovered {new Date(lastUpdate).toDateString()} Number of recovered covid19 cases Deaths {new Date(lastUpdate).toDateString()} Number of covid19 deaths
) } export default Cards;
